mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user(username, password, realname, weixin, roleid, enable) VALUES (#{username},#{password},#{realname},#{weixin},#{roleid},#{enable})
mapper.select: SELECT t_user.*,t_role.id as 'role.id',t_role.rolename as 'role.rolename' FROM t_user INNER JOIN t_role on t_user.roleid = t_role.id WHERE t_user.username = #{username}
